title: Equation Writing pt1
text: What ways do you know to write an equation in latex? Which one would be the simplest one?

title: Equation Writing pt2
text: Mathematics relays on variables like x, y and z. What other language and its letters can be found in mathematics?

title: Equation Writing pt3
text: If certain words serve as keywords to do something, like render a Greek letter, then you couldn't write that keyword into a text anymore, could you? Does LaTeX have a way to deal with that?

title: Equation Writing pt4
text: You can put thing below or above other things by using _ and ^ respectively

title: Equation Writing pt5
text: Sometimes you want to group things together to affect them all together. How does Mathematics notate things in a group?
